title: New: Verlaine – Painted Lights
content:
The tag ‘Emotional indie rock’ hardly sells your own music, immediately drawing comparisons to the likes of Snow Patrol, Coldplay and of course kings of the genre; U2.

Don’t let that put you off Verlaine however, as their debut track Painted Lights may verge into epically cheesy guitar pop, it’s the strength of the songwriting, and the tenderness, particularly in the latter section of the track, that make it such an appealing listen. ‘So, tonight is all we have, to make this moment last‘ may be a lyric worthy of One Direction, but Painted Lights is just about the right side of stadium ready anthems.
